Pride of Scotland
Arbroath, Angus, Scotland, UK Best horn: Kirkcaldy Cornet solo contest: 1. A. McLean, Kirkcaldy. 2. F. Mellor, Bonnybridge Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £15, 3rd £10, 4th £5. 4 bands competed
Source: The Dundee Courier & Argus (Dundee, Scotland), Wednesday, March 22, 1893; Issue 12392.
